suites.title: E-Shop Main Functions
suites.description: Search items by search bar, view items, browsing items, adding items to shopping cart, viewing and updating shopping cart, checkout, removing items from shopping cart

steps.action: Type name of item to the search bar
steps.expected_result: Some results are already showing in autocomplete box

steps.action: Enter key and search button should work as confirmation of searching

cases.title: Browse Items
cases.description: Items can be found by browsing pages

steps.expected_result: Should load page with items of that section

steps.action: Check items if there are 3 columns of items and 9 rows on page
If there are more than 27 items under category, click on second page at the bottom of the list of items
steps.expected_result: Should load next page of items

steps.action: Check if there aren’t problem with wrong assignment to category
steps.expected_result: Catagory should contain only items that belongs to that specific category

cases.title: View Item
cases.description: Possibility to view item via browsing, searching and from shopping cart

steps.action: Browse item and click on some item
Search item and click on one
Open shopping cart and click on item in it

cases.title: Add Item to Shopping Cart
cases.description: Possibility to add item to shopping cart

steps.action: Take a look at list of items in some category and click on button “Add to the cart” without viewing the item
steps.expected_result: Item should be added to the shopping cart

steps.action: View some item and click on “Add to the cart” button
steps.expected_result: Item should be added to the shopping cart

cases.title: View/Update Shopping Cart
cases.description: Possibility to take a look into the shopping cart and update items in it

steps.action: View shopping cart by clicking on icon
In shopping cart, click on checkout button
steps.expected_result: Should load page with personal information about delivery address, payment method etc.

cases.title: Remove Item from Shopping Cart
cases.description: Possibility to remove item from shopping cart

steps.action: In shopping cart, click on remove button next to an item
steps.expected_result: Item should be removed from the shopping cart
